name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Prompt Pool: Collect, Share and Prompt it.

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save selected text to a local pool, Real-time translation, export to share, import other pools to gain new capabilities.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a software that helps you collect, share and manage prompts.

Simple, Open Source, Powerful.
All data is managed locally, never upload your data.

- Collect and import prompt
- Build and manage your prompt
- Share your prompt
- Free real-time translation

v2.1.2
Fixed bugs.
Optimize the UI.
Export prompt words by Tag.

v2.1.1
Fixed a bug.
